meanings.definition: A person or thing that pieces together or joins parts.
meanings.sent1: The puzzle piecer carefully connected all the pieces to complete the picture.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic was the piecer of the broken engine parts, fixing them together seamlessly.
meanings.sent3: The piecer tediously assembled the model ship, only to realize a piece was missing.
meanings.sent4: She was the piecer of our friendship, always bringing us together in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The artist was a master piecer, creating beautiful mosaics from various tiles.

meanings.definition: A worker in a textile mill who joins broken threads.
meanings.sent1: The diligent piecer quickly repaired the broken threads in the textile mill.
meanings.sent2: The experienced piecer skillfully fixed the threads, ensuring smooth operation of the looms.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played the role of a piecer, unraveling the threads in the mill.
meanings.sent4: She was the piecer of the fabric of the mill, weaving together threads of different colors.
meanings.sent5: The piecer's hands moved swiftly, reuniting the threads to create a strong fabric.
